name: Fly
componentes: VSM (a wing feather from any bird)
descricao:
You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft, unless it can stop the fall.
	**Enhanced Spell.** For each 5000 extra mana spent and 500 per minute, you can add an extra creature up to 6 creatures in total.
